thread.title: Trump: Bush can't run campaign, shouldn't run country
thread.title_full: Trump: Bush can't run campaign, shouldn't run country

title: Trump: Bush can't run campaign, shouldn't run country
text:
Trump says Bush is embarrassing his family, can't run a campaign and shouldn't run country 
By BRENDAN FARRINGTON Published: 10/24/15 1:46 pm EDT - Updated: 10/24/15 1:46 pm EDT 
JACKSONVILLE, Florida â€” Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush shouldn't be running the country if he can't even run his own campaign. 
Trump was in Jacksonville on Saturday, the day after the Bush campaign announced staff trims and 40 percent pay cuts for those who remain. He said Bush, the son and brother of former presidents, is embarrassing his family. 
Trump said he's only spent a couple of million dollars on his campaign and is leading in the polls. He said spending less and getting more is what the country should be doing. 
Thousands of raucous supporters cheered Trump in Bush's home state during a riverfront rally. Trump also made fun of Florida Sen. Marco Rubio , saying he's out of money and "sweating like a dog." 
  
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump gestures as he addresses supporters during a campaign stop at the Trump National Doral Miami resort, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 in Doral, Fla.. (AP Photo/Alan Diaz)
